title: Scoggins iestes Wherein is declared his pleasant pastimes in France, and of his meriments among the fryers: full of delight and honest mirth.
author: Scogan, John, fl. 1480.
publisher: Printed by Raph Blower, dwelling in Lambert hill neare old Fish street,
notes: Not in fact by John Scogan.
A different text from The jestes of Skogyn (STC 21850.3 and 21850.7), continuing Scoggin's adventures.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
